feed.title: Fort St. John - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Fort St. John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:21 AM MST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 9:00 PM MST Thursday 23 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 55 %
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: E 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
